website_summaries.verdict: An impressive charger that's versatile and capable of promptly delivering charges to numerous types of batteries. Combined with the components that come with it, you won't find a better choice.
pros: Charge your LiPo batteries and numerous other types with this powerful little charger that has a vivid screen and solid build
Includes a large bundle pack with a variety of connectors and accessories
cons: No XT60 or bullet connectors means you may need additional adapters

customer_reviews.title: Trash, did not stop sending charge and exploded the battery, catching fire in my room. Dangerous buying such crap. The factory s
customer_reviews.text: Trash, did not stop sending charge and exploded the battery, catching fire in my room. Dangerous buying such crap. The factory should pay more attention and test all equipment before selling. It could have burned down our whole house and killed everyone. Please post my review so that other buyers know the danger of choosing this item for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I just got the charger and no charging cords for my battery
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Tullos

customer_reviews.title: The directions are a poor translation of a foreign language chocked full of poor ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely confusing directions and mode controls. The directions are a poor translation of a foreign language chocked full of poor grammar and syntax, and are incomplete and at times very misleading. This is about as far from a user friendly product as you can get. I am fairly well versed in electrical power, understanding amperage, volts, watts, computation of before mentioned, and this product is basically unusable. It should not be this difficult to select A. Battery type, B. Volts, C. Amps, D Capacity, and whether or not you want to charge or discharge the battery. I would not recommend this charger. Simply too complex for the average user.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ceplecha

customer_reviews.title: Then i started getting weird messages like "overcharged cell"
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. I returned after a few days. It is supposed to be a Genuine Tenergy product? First it would not give me a consistent discharge for the same battery, after i checked it twice (and then a third). Then i started getting weird messages like "overcharged cell"; when i just checked the voltage of the 18650 and it was NOT overcharged. After the other messages about "bad connectivity" and then checking the circuit for continuity with a separate multimeter (and not finding a problem), I promptly started the return process. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: amy sibul

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger with some modest research on how to use!
customer_reviews.text: Im not a battery expert, but I have been able to learn a bit on the internet about how to get some of my older batteries back into usable condition. With the help of this charger I was able to do so pretty easily. Its a time consuming process for sure. Discharge/Charge cycling can be a slow process. Particularly the discharge process with this unit. Im not sure if its intentional or not. In any case, I have use this for airsoft batteries and RC batteries, both LIPO and NiMH. The connector options are great. It does not have a Traxxas connector, but luckily I already had one.
customer_reviews.author: Vic44

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: With all of the different possible connections, you can charge and maintain all of your batteries. I am using it mostly for Lipo and NiMH, so I programmed my usual batteries and saved it so I can quickly connect and charge. You really can control how fast you want to charge so that’s a bonus as you can safely charge batteries so they will keep a long life. Con: the directions are pretty tough to understand so I recommend looking up this charger online and following the YouTube tutorials. 5-10 minutes later and I was confident that I wouldn’t damage my batteries while charging. Other chargers similar to this one don’t include the power source- not sure why?
customer_reviews.author: kim koz

customer_reviews.title: Adapter for NiMH battery with banana connector
customer_reviews.text: This charger works well once you get the correct adapter and figure out how it works. I bought a Redcat Volcano which came with a NiMH battery with “banana connector”. The Tenergy charger description seemed to indicate that it would work for this battery. Well despite the octopus connector, it does not. After much searching on Amazon, I found the correct adapter: Battery Charger Charging Cable: HXT 4.0mm Male (Redcat, HobbyKing) to 4mm Bullet Banana Plugs Which works great. When it came time to use the charger, the manual proved to be highly confusing. I found a video on YouTube that explained very clearly how to use it. Works for both NiMH and LiPo so that's handy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Now my favorite charger on my bench
customer_reviews.text: Got one the other week. Currently using it to recondition some nicd packs for my work equipment. Bad enough my work device shuts off at 1.17v/cell, and there's no means to discharge further unless you take things apart, but why they're using really cheap nicds for a $10k hand carried device is beyond me. But after a few cycles with this charger I've gotten the full 4,000 mAh back. Using the customizable charge and discharge settings on the individual cells that have been problematic, then running a couple of cycles on the full pack. I'm gonna use this until the tires fall off.
customer_reviews.author: F_Gummp

customer_reviews.title: Charging sensitivity does not work
customer_reviews.text: This charger routinely over-charged by NiMH modules, often charging cells that should tap out at 8.5V to 9.2V or more. I had to babysit it to make sure it wouldn't cause the batteries to explode. It did this even after turning the charging sensitivity to minimum (which should cause the charging to discontinue early). The unit I got also read inaccurate voltage when compared to a multimeter. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Al D.

customer_reviews.title: Great battery charger for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Charger! This is my second one just so I can have a few batteries charging at the same time. I personally really like it and how easy it is to setup. I know there are other great chargers out there, but for the price and what it can do, it's well worth the money. I can charge any battery from a LiPo to NiMH, and from time to time a NiCad. It's great that they include everything in this now, including the power cord. A big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience of my 35 years. This company's "Customer Service" is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: There is no customer concern. I sent a product back that I only used 2, maybe 3 times before it would no longer charge and continuously shut down and restart. It was to be used to bring my hybrid battery out of discharge and time was an issue. I've sent the product back weeks ago and no updates, if they received it or any status. I'm beyond sick of waiting. I will spread my very dissatisfactory involvement with "Customer Service" and Tenergy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Anybody who charges a variety of batteries needs this! I was able to bring older lipo batteries that would have cost hundreds to replace back to life that were undercharged with this device. Check out the trick on youtube (charge on the NIMH cycle first for a couple minutes). I am really happy that I bought something that works and has already saved me money. Really like all the different connectors, and that I can charge the battery to exact specs (remember that 1000 mah is equal to 1.0 amps).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: This charger exceeded my expectations. Compact, powerful, easy-to-use. Multiple connectors to charge all different types of battery packs, as well the ability to discharge them. I can maintain all of my different types of batteries. Whether they are LiPO batteries, nickel metal hydride, or nickel cadmium batteries. This is an extremely versatile charger as it comes with its own power supply that you can plug into any 120 volt outlet, or it can be connected to a 12 volt automotive battery. Great charger, great price, this charger does it all!
customer_reviews.author: Rekless

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit, Well made! Fast delivery! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Poor manual, "Chinglish" LOUSY TECH support guy had minimal knowledge. However it is a GREAT unit after you figure out how to use it. I use it ALOT and found a little blower fan helps to keep things cool. One like a notebook cooler blower fan, it directs the air where it is needed, not a "fan." You can get a lot of hints by looking at other user responses for similar looking items. I think the same unit is rebranded under several names, they all look the same. Also check YouTube they talk a lot about this type of unit. :-) they use it for drone charging and RC stuff. Try it you will like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile! Great Value! Buy One Now!
customer_reviews.text: Charges all manner of battery chemistries. Very versatile with the available charge options, including the D>C/C>D cycling which is great for NiMh and NiCd tuneups! The charge harness has every popular connector type and a bare set of leads for specialty ones you might use. I soldered Anderson Powerpoles onto mine. Buy one. Period! No downside, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you are serious about charging
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's a bit intimidating with all of its settings, but when you have multiple good batteries that will not charge with cheaper "smart" chargers, you turn to a device like this. This product works as advertised and does in fact balance charge batteries that two separate "smart" chargers I purchased would not. Well worth the money. For reference, I use the balance charging option for 11.1v LiPo batteries for airsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B. Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: It worked to help me balance the cells on my Prius battery.  It will work for you to.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact this unit has lots of options and works with many kinds of battery chemistries. I used it to balance all the voltages on the various cells of my Prius Hybrid battery before I put it up for sale. Great little unit. No problems with it. WIh it came with more types of connectors and cables though it ooes come with a few.... I had to build several cables of my own to adapt it for some types of common NiMH battery packs like the ones used on some cordless digital phones.
customer_reviews.author: MattGuyver

customer_reviews.title: This works great for all my NiMH
customer_reviews.text: This works great for all my NiMH, NiCad, and LiPo batteries that I've attempted to charge. The "charging squid" it comes with is also pretty awesome. I've learned that virtually every battery charger uses the same technology so this does what some of the pricier (and admittedly, some cheaper) chargers do. The 5A limit might be a problem if you have a high mAh LiPo that charges at over 1C though.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Frederic Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality charger
customer_reviews.text: Good charger for the money. It's fast at what it does. You can set exactly how fast or slow you want to charge or discharge your battery. Shuts down automatically after charging process. I never really notice a extreme heat build up while running so I recommend this for those wanting to start RC Hobby. The instructions are okayish hard to follow. But if you play with it enough youll figure it out quickly as I had to myself.
customer_reviews.author: WUEBBZ007

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile charger. Great for any level hobbyist.
customer_reviews.text: Can't ask for anything more, it is a cheap dependable charger. Ive had it for a few weeks now, and ive used the hell out of it. Love it. I noticed that it has brought new life back to older packs I have. It comes with the TB6-B unit, power cord, 120v power supply, 2-6s balance connector board, and a multi-tap cable with common connectors except xt60. Aside from no XT-60 lead there is a set of unused wires on the multi-tap cable that allows you to solder on any connector you wish. Super versatile unit, with many user programable options.
customer_reviews.author: PapaBear

customer_reviews.title: Worst instructions ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Almost returned this charger. Look up instructions in Youtube and everything makes sense. Dont bother reading the instructions that came with the charger, throw them away and look up for the instructional video. The charger works fine, thats why the 3 stars, but without looking up for the instructions in youtube the charger would have been useless.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, handled with care
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely, came in 1 day. Testing it now but all seems well! Hope I don't short this one like I did with the keenstone one I just smoked. Blew a voltage a voltage regulator IC on the board on that one and it was still working...? Hopefully these safeties work better. And I hope I don't need them either. Thanks Tenergy. Will report back if needed. Update. Tenergy sent me new power supply as the original had a loose connection and would intermittently reboot especially if moved the slightest. New one solved that issue so great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: S. Short

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger I Own
customer_reviews.text: I have went through three chargers and one was a cheap charger from Tenergy which was DOA. I decided to drop some more money for a better quality and this one hits the money. Plugged in my battery and off it goes! I'm still playing with it now as I just received it. So far everything works besides the connector for charging using the pins. Just wont charge and gives me the error of "Break connection". Its seated properly for a good connection. I'll troubleshoot more as it could possibly be user error but I highly doubt it. I'll update this as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Throw away the rest of your chargers
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Price... Can only charge one battery at a time Pros: I used to have specific chargers for my 3S and 4S batteries, my LiFeMn4 whatever batteries, my car batteries, my remote electric fence batteries made out of lead. With this charger I have no need for any of those other chargers. I just scroll through the menu for a couple of seconds, customize the settings to my specific battery, save the settings for future use, then charge. I have made custom cables for all of the outputs from this thing for each of my batteries so I can hook every single one of my batteries up to this in seconds. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I should give it 5 stars as it's worked for me, but then I've only used it to charge a couple of new Nimh packs. Not sure if it's the charger or the batteries, but they're supposed to be 5000mah capacity, but when the charger is done, it's reads them at around 2700-2800. Also, the instructions aren't very clear. Had to go online for some clarification, but after that, it's pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your balance board does not touch the zipper on your fire bag.
customer_reviews.text: My balance board touched the metal zipper on my fire safety bag and caused it to spark, smoke and almost fire. Be careful to not make this same mistake. This charger is not easy to use but will do a large variety of functions if you want to take a few hours to learn all the buttons. Customer support is not available. It goes to a voicemail.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to do. The pigtail comes with all the connectors you should need and if it doesn't it comes with 2 wires ready to solder on the one you need, which is what I did. The menu on the charger is super easy to navigate. One thing I really like is it comes with an adapter to hook the charger to a car battery so I can charge on the go. Anyone who fly's drones knows charging on the go is a necessity. Very happy with the purchase. I would recommend this to someone who's looking for an all around great/simple charger.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Duda

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you know how to properly charge lipo batteries etc.
customer_reviews.text: The charger is good and reliable. HOWEVER! This is not a plug and play peices if equipment. If you don't know what you are doing as far as calculations on lipo charge rates etc.. Don't use it. Do your research and watch a video on YouTube about how to use this thing. It's a good charger. Take the time to know what you are doing so you don't burn your house down. Charging lipos should not be taken lightly like charging you iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Works great, solid charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought to charge LiPos for new RC truck. Manual is junk - you can tell they really put a good hearted effort into writing it, but translation from Chinese is just rough. After you know how to use it, manual becomes a better reference. But initially, online videos can make easy sense of how to use and program it. Cycling feature was able to revive some older NiMH batteries that I was ready to pitch in trash, which saved me $30 on those, alone. Sturdy construction, metal case, small form factor, programmable options, what more could you ask for? Totally dig it and can't see what else I could need from a charger.
customer_reviews.author: SKR513

customer_reviews.title: Does not include the Traxxas connector as shown in the video
customer_reviews.text: Video shows a Traxxas "TRX" plug but the charger does not include it. The only reason i bought this was to charge the Traxxas truck my son just got for Christmas. Just bought one and in a few additional days we will get to charge the battery....
customer_reviews.author: G N

customer_reviews.title: never charges lipo to full capacity
customer_reviews.text: not sure why but every pack charged on this drops rapidly compared to using other chargers. pull a charged pack from the tenergy, all of my other chargers will top off the pack another 15-20%.
customer_reviews.author: signal8

customer_reviews.title: Best RC charger I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger and you can charge just about any battery. Was so much better then the original Traxxas charger that I had. It beeps at you when it's done and will not overcharge. I recommend to buy it. You may need to buy a different banana clip depending what battery you are charging.
customer_reviews.author: Orin Wright

customer_reviews.title: !AMAZON!Charger return please
customer_reviews.text: This charger doesn’t suit my needs. The only reason I bought it was for the discharging and balance charge. Neither of do I need for AA lithium batteries Hay AMAZON!I would like to return this item I am outside my return date by 1 week I found a charger that works better for me- ( X-coarack Miboxer)
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value, bad manual.
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well! It's smaller than I expected. The directions are absolutely horrendous, but there's a video on Youtube that explains the basic steps, and once I saw that, the rest made sense. I absolutely love this charger. It comes with a several popular connectors, plus an extra set of leads for adding your own. Now I can charge everything I own. I've has this for a few days and have used to: Charge NiMH (6 cell packs and my transmitter) Discharge NiMH (6 cell pack) Balance charge LIPO (2S and 3S) Discharge for storage LIPO (3S) As long as you're willing to figure out the somewhat unintuitive interface, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Behr

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if you need additional connectors for your batteries and you'll be all good.
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised. If you have lipo batteries, you'll want this and to use balance charging if you can. If your battery has two different connectors, the other one is probably for the balancing board. It helps charge your battery completely and correctly. I have a few hubsan quadcopters and purchased this for my new x4 H501s. You'll need to buy a EC2 connector though. I also had to solder connectors for my hubsan h107s, but no biggie. Check to see if you need additional connectors for your batteries and you'll be all good.
customer_reviews.author: D.Graham

customer_reviews.title: Slow This Thing Is So Slow Charging - Trash
customer_reviews.text: This thing chargers so slow.. For a 3s lipo charging at 1.5 amps.. It takes almost 50 minutes on balance mode.. That’s worth the battery at about 20% charge. My 6s takes way longer... I don’t even bother charging my 6s with this anymore. We’re talking 2 hours..
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Rigual

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile It’s easy to use and understand It came with a lot of different connectors for the various common battery connectors Tip I did add a positive and negative insulated alligator clip because for some reason that wasn’t one of the options And I have found it very helpful
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive charger.
customer_reviews.text: It's not hard to figure out, don't pay attention to the negative reviews. Took me about 5 minutes to set up and start charging LiPo batteries. Came with everything I needed. If you can read literally what it says printed on the front of your battery, you can figure out how to set up this charger. Instructions are translated from Chinese, kind of funny. But I didn't even need them.
customer_reviews.author: Maynard

customer_reviews.title: hmm
customer_reviews.text: Same electronics as all of the other balance chargers out there by I-max, keenstone etc. I should have checked the connection more closely, as the wiring harness is useless for many batteries out there. Make sure to pick up a set of banana plugs specifically for your needs if you buy this charger.
customer_reviews.author: RTegland

customer_reviews.title: save yourself the extra money and buy a charger that ...
customer_reviews.text: save yourself the extra money and buy a charger that does more than 5 Amps. It takes over an hour and fifteen minutes to charge a 3s/5000mah LiPo. The balance board cable is only about 2" long so it's hard to get the cables to fit inside of my lipo safe charge bag. also, the external power supply is an inconvenience at times as far as table space goes. It does the job for entry level but youll soon want an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: mussels.marinara

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic charger for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic charger for the money. It is the way to go if you need a one size fits all charger. I am able to charge a wide range of airsoft batteries from Lipo to older nickel metal batteries. The storage feature is very nice for Lipo batteries. The user manual is informative regarding the operation of the charger but you will need to use online resources to gain a basic knowledge about safe battery charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: My husband has been wanting one of these for a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting one of these for a while to add to his test bench. He's excited about all the things this balance will allow him to do with the electronics he builds. Right now he has 18650 batteries he has pulled from old laptops getting tested and if healthy, they will find new life in his projects
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Translated
customer_reviews.text: The reason for my lower rating was the poorly written user manual. I found it hard to understand because so many words were used incorrectly in the translation from Chinese to English. I basically had to play around with it to figure out how it worked. When I get use to it I will update my ratings.
customer_reviews.author: JAMRPOI

customer_reviews.title: Very good charger that could use a better operating manual
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile charger that handles every battery I have or probably will buy. The operation manual is very difficult to understand. I probably would have been able to figure it out eventually, but found a YouTube video that explained it adequately.
customer_reviews.author: BobT

customer_reviews.title: Good versatile charger
customer_reviews.text: Great for balance and storage charging of my lipos. Programmable for different charge/discharge rates. Good purchase. Manual isn't much help for learning the charger, but videos online help explain how to set up the unit
customer_reviews.author: Soke

customer_reviews.title: Wery good charger last for years
customer_reviews.text: I have it for some years now and it's working much better than my more expensive one that can charge 4 battery at once that is not charging do to bad power supply.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review July 9th This initially seemed like a fine charger but recently I have been having trouble with it over charging one or more cells. This is really concerning considering the risk of fire when Lipos are overcharged. Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Great charger! I fly racing drones and this is perfect. Even came with power adapter and a variety of battery connectors. I also use a parallel charging board with this and can charge 6 batteries in less then an hour. Pretty awesome. Also came with alligator clips that allow you to connect to car battery and charge at the field. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Charges everything it says it can, and does it well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger for a LIPO for my RC airplane, but to my surprise it can also do NIMH very well. In fact quite well and with a great deal of customization as to the charge level and amount, as such it has helped give new life to previously shelved RC airplanes in my garage that I had long ago lost the chargers for.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I only have a cheap poor quality free charger to compare to so I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my 250 quad, however doesn't come with an XT60 connector. The balance port plastic also came out and is actually easier to use with just the bare prongs (but now I have to remember which way to flip the battery balance charger). I only have a cheap poor quality free charger to compare to so I can't give a great comparison. The menu is easy to use however and the voltage seems to match my voltmeter. This also doesn't seem to get hot at all like some chargers i've read about. The battery also does not get hot.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for all my NiMH, NiCad, and LiPo batteries that I've attempted to charge. The "charging squid" it comes with is also pretty awesome.This is a great deal for RC hobby because you get a great charger along with the power supply so you don't have to run around trying to figure out what power supply works best. Also, the memory feature saves time when you are on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Rmoore

customer_reviews.title: Super fast charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger vs the stock charger that came with my Redcat Terremoto is night and day. My stock charger took over 8 hours to charge an 8000mah battery. The Tenergy took about 1 hour on balance mode for the 8000 mah 2S LiPo. It also makes a sound when the battery is fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instruction Manual
customer_reviews.text: I thought the instruction booklet was poorly written. This is my first charger and I had to watch a lot of videos online to get a better understanding of how to operate it. The instructions are clearly translated from another language. There are multiple grammar errors which led to confusion trying to read it. Now that I understand how it all works, the actual operation of the charger is quite easy and seems to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: mcamp

customer_reviews.title: Does everything well
customer_reviews.text: With the addition of a charging adapter/sled for PH-2 1S cells, I was able to literally box up half a dozen different chargers and manage all of my different battery needs from one device.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger...Instructions Need Work Though
customer_reviews.text: This charger worked great, once I figured out how to change it to LiFe settings. I have two LiFe batteries for the electric start on my paramotor and it charged them both perfectly. My only complaint about this product are the instructions. They are horribly translated into English. My recommendation is to search YouTube for a demo video...especially if you are charging LiFe batteries. It will be much easier to understand than trying to decipher the included instructions. Other than that, I fully recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Useful battery charger
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I think this is the best described product I have seen. This is my first battery charger. Till this used own made one but this is awesome and loved it very much since first day. Important detail have safety which is very useful. Best product for RC products. Advise everyone to buy without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Grigol

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really works great! I am a disappointed in the instructions, but luckily there are Youtube videos that help you figure things out. So, if you purchase this, do look out on Youtube to help you figure out how to use. Aside from that, it does charge the batteries! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Manfred Kunze

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I recently got back into RC cars and picked this charger up. I use this to charge a couple lipo batteries. Watched a few YouTube videos on how to set it up and use. You can store up to 5 presets, charge, balance charge, discharge and plenty of other features I probably won’t use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Works but gets too hot to handle when charging.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a 4s lithium ion pack and it charges the pack, but it gets so hot while charging that I can't keep my fingers on it and have to unplug it before handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Charges Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've been driving RC cars for the last several years so I have a large collection of Lipo batteries always needing charged. This charger has performed just as expected and hoped. It charges quickly and it remains cool while doing it. This is my secondary charger so.that I can charge 2 batteries at once for my eRevo and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do hv lipo
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do hv batteries and you cant manually adjust the voltage. Also the discharge rate is sooo slow it will timeout before any battery gets into storage voltage. Xt30 and xt60 connectors would be nice as well
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: High quality and versital charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger works well with all types of batteries really like the fact that you can take it with you and hook it to 12 volt power supply fast and reliable charger
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dyarman

customer_reviews.title: U will learn how to launch the space shuttle after using this charger
customer_reviews.text: Im pretty sure is a good charger, but is like u operating the Space Shuttle!!! So many options and configurations had my batteries charging for a couple hrs to find out they weren't even charging yet!! Wayyy too much in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ochavo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome charger. Simple to use and has every feature you need. I mainly charge 2s 5500mah LiPo with balance charging and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: RobM

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Recommend to anyone getting into the RC hobbie.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: So many things to worry about when charging LiPO batteries. Need to wacth youtube videos to understand how to use this correctly.
customer_reviews.author: MrsPeep

customer_reviews.title: Tenergy TB6-B Balance Charger Discharger 1S-6S Digital Battery Pack Charger
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this now for several months and wished I had purchased it sooner. Works great and easy to use. Definity recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Charges my RC airplane batteries fast. easy to use once you figure it out. I looked up a Youtube video instead of reading the confusing constructions
customer_reviews.author: Lori Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger, have been using for 6 months no problems
customer_reviews.author: Ext290

customer_reviews.title: Needs XT60 plug
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very nice charger. With all those connectors you would think there would be an XT60 plug but there is not. Pretty simple to add one. The balance charger works great but the wires leading to the board could be a bit longer. I like the fact that you can connect the charger to a car battery for charging out in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Hirise

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to LIPOs but not RC. This is my first LIPO charger so I have no basis of comparison however the unit feels well-builtAnd does what it says. I’ve used it to balance charge and store.
customer_reviews.author: RonJ

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: What a great little charger. I was waiting for a backordered lipo charger from Horizon Hobby. After several weeks I gave up looked on Amazon found this and ordered it. It cost half of the one I was waiting for from Horizon Hobby. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt user friendly,even with instructions.Terrible on returns.Had to deal directly with Amazon to get a refund.Wouldnt recommend dealing with this company
customer_reviews.author: dave anderson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works for so many rc batteries! Has many plugs to fit all kinds of adapters! Easy lcd screen with menu and options! Definitely recommend for any rc hobbiest.
customer_reviews.author: jimbob h.

customer_reviews.title: Confusing manual, but a really good value for money...
customer_reviews.text: Quite cheap compared to the traxxas...! the manual is confusing and it cant charge two battery in a same time. the NIMH and LIPO charger cost 35 each in my town hobby store. so if you you want to charge 2 battery in the same time just buy two different charger. especially when you already known what battery that you want to charge... the charge is fast. it took 1 hour to charge my 1200MAH NIMH battery. it stop charging when the battery is full and show how much time it took to charge and how much capacity that has been charge. nice info..!
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Nurhasan

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and lots of adjustable settings
customer_reviews.text: Works great but u need a little knowledge on what your doing. It charges my battery’s in half the time my dynamite charger does and it lets me know a lot more as far as time charging and so on. I’m going to buy another rather than buy a dual charger I like knowing each battery has the full commitment of the charger it’s on
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the hobby. This charger seems to work perfectly. I've used it for about 10 charging cycles and several storage cycles.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fast, safe battery charging!
customer_reviews.text: If you do a lot of flying like i do then you know how much it sucks to wait for your batteries to charge. I use 3S 11.1 2200 batteries and a 5500. I use the highest setting which is 5A and it charges the 2200 in 15-20 min and the 5500 in 35-40 min. You can even balance charge the batteries but I just charge them as is. I don't see a point in balance charging the batteries every time. A great charger if your a hobbiest and plan on using many different types of batteries. Charges lipo from 2S to 6S.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Merc

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Hard to Use
customer_reviews.text: The charger works great. I use it on lead acid, LiPo, and LiFePO4 batteries. The user interface is terrible. If you have to switch battery types, it is very confusing and hard to remember.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible instruction manual. I almost sent it back because I couldnt get it to work. Then I found a YOUTUBE tutorial on the unit and was able to get the thing running with a really simple fix. So...the unit is decent, just watch that video!
customer_reviews.author: Theynine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great product
customer_reviews.text: This charger preforms very well. Great price point for this item. Charges my 5200 lipo batteries great in a matter of 30 minutes or less on fast charge and roughly 75 minutes on balanced charge. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!! Doesn’t fully charge batteries!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was good, but after a couple of uses it stopped fully charging my batteries. Bought brand new batteries, still didn’t fully charge them, also noticed voltage sag
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Not this easiest charger to use but there's a tutorial on YouTube by Turnegy that is easy to follow. Can be programmed to memorize different battery settings. Only downside is that mine didn't have the xt90 plug. Very satisfied and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wong

customer_reviews.title: 2 year review
customer_reviews.text: Have charged everything from 12vdc lead acid, to drone batteries, to R/C lipo. Been through it's time, and still runs strong. Power supply gave out after a year. It had stopped working at one point, checked out why, and the power supply had failed. Tried to fix it, but was dead. Had an old computer power supply to replace it with. Been working ever since. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Method

customer_reviews.title: You must set this up correctly BEFORE charging!
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, but some functions shown in the small manual do not work, such as NiMh auto charge. Not sure if I would use to charge a flooded lead acid with this unit. DO NOT USE ON LIPO BATTERIES UNATTENDED! A model shop close to me tells a story of one user that burned down his garage because he selected the wrong battery size when charging and left to go inside to watch TV. He had other batteries nearby and they all caught fire! You MUST select the correct charging method, battery type and size otherwise you could have a dangerous situation on your hands. Build a fireproof charging box or buy one here to protect yourself!
customer_reviews.author: GSFITZ

customer_reviews.title: But Tenergy, not imax!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have gone with this one to start with! Don’t waste your money on the Imax B6!! It worked once, then would not detect the correct number of cells, but the Tenergy has worked Everytime!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Dee Bilbrey

customer_reviews.title: smart charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Comes with lots of cable options, can hook up to DC power source (12v car battery) to charge in the field. I mostly fly helis that use different batteries, got this to charge the various types. As with all chargers (especially lithium) I would recommend against leaving this plugged in all the time and I would monitor the charging process. Lithium batteries can be rather volatile and we wouldn't want to burn down the house just to charge our RC toy battery.
customer_reviews.author: desertfox

customer_reviews.title: Good value as a mid-level charger
customer_reviews.text: Good value as a mid-level charger, but I was surprised to see it does not include a XT30 connector, but includes many of the older and some outdated connectors. If I had to select a charger now I would probably not consider this one, but if it includes the connectors you use then it's a decent value.
customer_reviews.author: Callisto

customer_reviews.title: Very advanced, will not charge unless correct specs entered!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very advanced charger, you will not be able to charge a battery without typing in the correct specs. This is great for lipo batteries so you don’t burn down you’re house. I use it for my rc boat batteries it charges them in 15 minutes compared to the 2 hour wall charger!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Best charger for the price!  $yrs old work's great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3.1 yrs. ago, I charge 2-6 6S lipo's a day!!!!!!!!!! No problems works like new!!!!!!!!! UPDATE! Four year's old now charging 6-S lipo's. are still working like new!
customer_reviews.author: t.wiley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charger for Ni-MH or LiPo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, easy to program (even without the booklet). Small and compact. Case is metal, the power supply breaks down into plug + brick & wire. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: If you want a quality charger. Here it is
customer_reviews.text: Just getting back into rc and I’ll tell you this charger is awesome it can charge pretty much anything and it’s silent no annoying fans. It transfers all its heat to the heat sinks which work very well I’ve never had this thing even get hot. I would but again
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: The no fan feature is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I originally bough a traxxas battery charger and that thing was a piece of crap. This charger is completely quite and it doesn't have a fan that breaks after a few months like the traxxas junk chargers. I just use this for a 2s battery and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Does it all, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good all-in-one balance charger and this one is great, like the other reviews I read on Amazon, the person who wrote the instructions for this needs a better command of the English language, but with a little work and patience, you will be very happy with this charger. The noticed that the learning curve is a little steep, but if you are electronically inclined, you will get operation of this item in no time. I subtracted one star because of the instructions, if they fix that and make them more clear, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Duane G. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Go to YouTube for instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I like it - however, it is a bit complicated to use and the instruction manual (written in halting English) is not very comprehensive. So if you buy this I strongly recommend you go on YouTube and watch the videos - there are several and they are very helpful - the manual that comes with the charger, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hagy

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Definitely read the entire manual before attempting to use. I did and glad I did. Great charger for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: DHOLMES

customer_reviews.title: WORKS great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to my old charger kicking the bucket. Wish I would of bought his model to begin with. It's a little confusing at first but once you figure out what you're doing it's easy to charge different batteries. It charges all types but I only have used it for lipos. It seems to have brought a couple of my older batteries back to life...it charges and balances very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Charger!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Charger! Can fast charge a 5200 mah 2s in about 30 min. Balance charging works very well. Best charger for the price ive owned.
customer_reviews.author: MoonMoonAugust

customer_reviews.title: ... no success--the instructions that come with the unit are useless and any of the You Tube Videos are almost ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this item and have had it for 2 days trying to figure out how to program its many features--with absolutely no success--the instructions that come with the unit are useless and any of the You Tube Videos are almost impossible to follow--If you are an electrical engineer you should be able to make this work --I certainly could not--I returned product to Amazon for a refund and will look for a a simpler charger to use--that is more user friendly--very disappointed--Not user friendly in any way shape or form
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Just a great charger
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I've playing with R/C for over 25 years. I've tried and have had many different chargers. This thing is very easy use. Just a great charger.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lee

product_meta.title: Tenergy TB6-B Balance Charger Discharger 1S-6S Digital Battery Pack Charger for NiMH/NiCD/Li-PO/Li-Fe Packs LCD Hobby Battery Charger w/ Tamiya/JST/EC3/HiTec/Deans Connectors + Power Supply 01435
feature_bullets: ONE CHARGER MANY BATTERY PACKS - Tenergy TB6-B balance charger/discharger is ideal for all hobby battery packs that are NiMH, NiCd, LiPO, Li-ion, LiFePO4, and SLA battery packs.

WIDE CONNECTOR COMPATIBILITY - With one multi-charging harness, this AC balance charger can recharge battery packs with tamiya, mini tamiya, JST, HiTec, EC3, Deans, XT60, and bare leads connectors so that additional connectors can be added.

WIDE VOLTAGE COMPATIBILITY - Use the battery pack balance charger on NiMH/NiCd 1.2V-18V (1S-15S), with popular options of 6V, 7.2V, 9.6V, 12V. LiPO/Li-ion 3.7V-22.2V (1S-6S), with voltage capabilities such as 7.4V, 11.1V, 14.8V. LiFePO4 3.2V-19.2V (1S-6S), with popular options of 9.6V, 12.8V, 16V. SLA 2V-20V.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS - More than a regular digital balance charger, Tenergy TB6-B comes with features like Li-ion and LiPO balancing, fast charging, data storage, cyclic charging, discharging, and much more for all of your battery packs.

EASY TO READ SCREEN - View all charging statuses and settings on the electronic balance charger LCD screen as you navigate the modes and selections. Buy with confidence, your charger includes Tenergy a 12-month warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,303 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
